name: Soreyuke Ebisumaru Karakuri: Meiro Kieta Goemon no Nazo
overview: A spin-off of the Ganbare Goemon series, Soreyuke Ebisumaru, translated as "Go Forth Ebisumaru! The Trick Labyrinth - The Mystery of Goemon's Disappearance!!", is a 1996 puzzle game starring the titular fat ninja. Viewed from an overhead angled perspective, you are given a small but complex level and must guide Ebisumaru to the end!
